last_episode_to_air.name: Bluebird Flies
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tamar puts her secret plan to move out on hold following Vince's car accident; Tamar and Vince release her new album together, but Tamar decides to move out and file for divorce.

name: Tamar & Vince
overview: Follow Tamar Braxton and husband Vincent Herbert as they navigate their hectic lives, from Tamar’s solo album to Vince’s busy career as a successful music producer.

episodes.name: Meet the Herberts
episodes.overview: Tamar Braxton and her husband Vince take on career and family; Tamar's progress in the recording studio.

episodes.name: Calling All Tamartians
episodes.overview: Tamar's solo album and clash with Vince; Vince's health and Tamar's career is threatened; 2012 ESSENCE Music Festival.

episodes.name: Nurse Ratchet
episodes.overview: Vince has another health scare; Tamar puts recording on a pause; Tamar and Vince's marriage is at risk.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince go on a lovers' retreat in Hawaii with LaShawn and April; a major blowup between Tamar and Vince.

episodes.name: Clash of the Herberts
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince's marriage is in jeopardy; an emergency counselling session; Tamar clashes with her stylist.

episodes.name: Road to Recovery
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince meet with an interior designer; Vince's health is at stake; Tamar's album in L.A.; Vince visits his parents' graves.

episodes.name: Gaga for Gaga
episodes.overview: Tamar performs the National Anthem at a football game; Vince and Tamar head to London for some business and fun.

episodes.name: Model Wife
episodes.overview: Papa Braxton gives marital advice; LaShawn and April aruge; Tamar struggles on a new ballad and hits the catwalk for the first time.

episodes.name: The Showcase Must Go On!
episodes.overview: Tamara has her hands full organizimg a music showcase to promote the release of her first single. Preparations include an avant-garde photo shoot and auditions for a backup band.

episodes.name: Are You Ready for Tamar?!?
episodes.overview: Tamar auditions hot male dancers. Tamar and Vince go to Vegas and Tamar takes the stage with debut songs.

episodes.name: It's a Herbert
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince reveal the gender of their baby. They're shocked when Tamar's father refuses to come stay with them after the baby is born. On Tamar's promotional tour, she stresses about hiding her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Bump on the Road
episodes.overview: As Tamar dazzles her fans on second leg of her tour, she battles pregnancy issues and argues with Vince over her next single. They finally make their baby announcement, then rush home to move into a bigger house.

episodes.name: Posh & Pregnant
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince design their new house. Tamar is challenged to downsize her shoe collection. They get parenting tips from LaShawn and April and go to a childbirth class. Tamar gets special dress for award show.

episodes.name: For the Record
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince go to NYC to promote her album, and Tamar reveals her growing belly at a pregnancy photo shoot. Terrell directs Tamar for a video greeting for RuPaul's Drag Race. Tamar and Vince search for a nanny.

episodes.name: What to Expect When You're Poppin'
episodes.overview: Vince wants Tamar to shoot her next music video while still pregnant; Tamar is bummed out by the wardrobe options for the shoot. Her sisters and mom help with a belly cast. Tamar & Vince take their last birth class.

episodes.name: Labor Of Love
episodes.overview: Trina and Traci embarrass Tamar at her star-studded baby shower. The mood is tense while Tamar and Vince shoot family photos with Miracle. Tamar goes into labour stressed out and has complications right away.

episodes.name: Baby Herbert Arrives
episodes.overview: Tamar has a difficult labour, and she and Vince must make a tough decision. Tamar finally gives birth to a baby boy, and the Braxton clan debates names. The couple fight while driving home from the hospital.

episodes.name: Jet Set Baby
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince return to Los Angeles and experience highs and lows of new parenthood; Baby has first photo shoot; Tamar can't fit into the outfits for her album cover photo; she questions the direction for her album.

episodes.name: Mama Works Hard for Her Coin
episodes.overview: Tamar struggles to balance motherhood and career; Tamar's new talk show, magazine cover shoot and final decision for the album.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Number One Club
episodes.overview: Tamar's new album is released and she celebrates with an exclusive bash; Tamar and Vince clash over Tamar's success.

episodes.name: Tour De Tamar
episodes.overview: Tamar's career goes into overdrive. Vince and Tamar hit the road but communication issues cause problems.

episodes.name: Superdome Superstar
episodes.overview: Tamar's solo tour and biggest show yet at New Orleans Superdome; Tamar and Vince have a blowup; Tamar's appearance at a Miami fashion show.

episodes.name: Crazy for Cabo
episodes.overview: Tamar uses social media against Vince's wishes, and LaShawn tells his true feelings about Terrell and his partner's relationship.

episodes.name: A Ruff Surprise
episodes.overview: Vince surprises Tamar with a new dog for Logan; Tamar works on her talk show; Tamar and Vince develop a liquor line; Tamar worries about her mom's health.

episodes.name: Viva La Video!
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince have a standoff as they struggle to shoot the music video. LaShawn does stand-up at a comedy club.

episodes.name: Tamar's Work Is Never Done
episodes.overview: Tamar's talk show is shut down by an accident on location; Tamar's single release and music video.

episodes.name: Lies You Tell!
episodes.overview: Tamar gets questioned about having a second baby and takes a lie detector test; Tamar worries about promoting her single while busy with her talk show and fashion line; Vince is ready to bring Miracle home.

episodes.name: Gone Fishin'
episodes.overview: Tamar, Vince and friends go on mountain retreat, while Toni watches baby Logan. Vince pushes Tamar for a second baby.

episodes.name: The Herbert Hustle
episodes.overview: In the Season 4 premiere, Tamar prepares to release her next album while taping the new season of her talk show. Later, Tamar worries about balancing her work after Vince reveals that she'll be competing on "Dancing With the Stars."

episodes.name: Double-Booked to Capacity
episodes.overview: Tamar hits the road to promote her new album then heads to D.C. for an event with April. Later, Tamar plans her new music video and performs a dance inspired by a time when Vince was gravely ill.

episodes.name: It's a Jungle Out Here
episodes.overview: Tamar travels to the Caribbean to shoot her music video and worries that she'll lose rehearsal time with her new dance partner. Later, Toni gives Tamar advice about "Dancing With the Stars" and a disconcerting text on Vince's phone.

episodes.name: Catfish
episodes.overview: Vince signs new female artists without telling Tamar; Tamar confronts Vince about a text from a woman named Kiki; and Tamar shoots a music video with her friends. Later, Logan walks in a fashion show on "The Real."

episodes.name: You Was Flat, Dawg
episodes.overview: Tamar is stressed about her upcoming tour because she's not pleased with her background singers and is worried she'll lose her voice. Later, Vince substitutes for Tamar on "The Real" while she's sick.

episodes.name: Dying To Dance
episodes.overview: Tamar worries about losing her voice during her Orlando performance and learning her dance for Dancing with the Stars. Later, Tamar ends up in the hospital after overworking herself.

episodes.name: A Rib to Spare
episodes.overview: Tamar is nervous about her upcoming surgery to remove her rib; Vince stresses to Tamar it's important to slow down. Later, Toni gives Tamar some health advice.

episodes.name: Sisters Know Best
episodes.overview: Tamar's sisters arrive for a surprise visit that's full of pampering and fun; Evelyn lets her daughter know how she really feels about her going back to work so soon; and Tamar goes on a mommy-son date with Logan.

episodes.name: Notorious P.I.G.
episodes.overview: Tamar worries about traveling by airplane after her health scare. Later, Tamar hangs out with her sister Traci in Washington D.C.; and Evelyn reveals that she was rushed to the hospital.

episodes.name: If I Don't Have You
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince disagree about a house in Atlanta. Logan's pig. Evelyn visits LA for the Grammy awards, and a pie bake-off. Vince goes to the hospital!

episodes.name: Love and War
episodes.overview: Tamar is on the fence with Vince Herbert as her manager and husband; Tamar decides what is best for her family and career.

episodes.name: Becky With The Good Hair
episodes.overview: After an explosive fight with Vince, Tamar plans a trip to Cabo to ease tension, but they soon learn they can't leave their problems behind. Vince storms out of dinner, and Tamar is left feeling alone.

episodes.name: Scattered, Smothered and Covered
episodes.overview: Vince lashes out after Tamar expresses a need for space, and the Mexico trip comes to an explosive end; the non-stop clashes prompt Tamar to make a painful decision; Tamar and Vince face off on the night of the concert.

episodes.name: Love Under New Management
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince struggle to reconcile before the show in Washington, D.C., and Tamar makes a heartbreaking decision; a painful truth is exposed during a dinner party.

episodes.name: Hard to Manage
episodes.overview: Tamar struggles to keep her marriage on good terms; Vince reveals his true feelings about working with Tamar; Tamar's father gives her tough love after months of no communication.

episodes.name: Last Effort for Peace
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince have a big blowout in Atlanta, prompting Tamar to hatch a secret plan; Tamar reunites with her friend, Tiny, after a very public feud and reveals major news; Tamar gets a telephone call that changes everything.

episodes.name: Bluebird Flies
episodes.overview: Tamar puts her secret plan to move out on hold following Vince's car accident; Tamar and Vince release her new album together, but Tamar decides to move out and file for divorce.
